head.title: Pharmaceutical Concern In Putnam County Is Sold

hedline.hl1: Pharmaceutical Concern In Putnam County Is Sold

abstract.p: Schein Pharmaceutical Inc, one of largest employers in Putnam County, NY, is sold to Watson Pharmaceuticals of Corona, Calif, for $644 million (S)

block.p: Schein Pharmaceutical Inc., one of Putnam County's largest employers, is being sold to Watson Pharmaceuticals of Corona, Calif., for $644 million. Watson Pharmaceuticals has more than 90 products, with a focus on dermatology and women's health. Schein, based in Florham Park, N.J., has been looking for a buyer for several months because of declining earnings and revenues. The company has 1,325 employees, with 480 of them working in Putnam.
